abstract: Apple stores are sold out of iPhones. Some analysts see signs of a new model coming. But one says Apple is simply favoring AT&T stores in order to lift its reported first-quarter sales.
snippet: Apple stores are sold out of iPhones. Some analysts see signs of a new model coming. But one says Apple is simply favoring AT&T stores in order to lift its reported first-quarter sales.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: See comment from Apple at the end.
